description: Numbers n such that n divides the (right) concatenation of all numbers <= n written in base 2 (most significant digit on right).
comments: This sequence differs from A061931 in that all least significant zeros are kept during concatenation.No more terms < 10^7. [Lars Blomberg, Oct 01 2011]
